0: Also location is excellent with walkable path all along the beach and light shopping and cafes close by
We saw many fish and sea turtles
Great location with Black Rock Beach for snorkeling right in front of the hotel and Whalers Village just a 5 10 minute walk
When we arrived we were immediately upgraded to a deluxe oceanfront view room with a wet bar huge bathroom and lanai overlooking the ocean
The resort itself is In a perfect position alongside black rock and the beach stunning
As was the case on our first stay we had a room in building 4 with a stunning view over the grounds pool and down the beach
The beach bar is the perfect location to watch whilst sipping a cocktail out of a coconut
8 minute beach walk to shopping and restaurants
The pool was perfect as well but you have to hit the beach pics included
1: Maui is paradise and Kanapali beach is bar none
Kapalani Beach site with Four Star Hotel
Oh also I will give a 1 because they had a beyond burger at the beach bar
They have free reef safe sun block near the beach but that is about the only good thing I can say for it
Shertaon has two pools connected by a waterway
The beach was nice but very busy since it ’s public
Can not get closer to the beach and some great snorkeling spots
2: The beach has eroded due to the storms over the winter so there is n’t much room to sit on the beach at high tide
The worst thing is that I can not enter my room after have my time at beach
Not only is the beach wider here than others on the the same stretch but the water is typically calmer and you will see lots of fish by black rock
When I returned to get my beach towel they still had none
it is unfortunate that even guests do not get an hour of free rental for beach rentals as we have found this with most other of the higher resorts but oh well
The sea was very dangerous and rough by this hotel and we found it quite scary the lack of lifeguards or signs or announcements
When we booked this time we booked “ ocean view ” not realizing all the technicalities of each room
The beach sand is so soft and the water is clear blue
So if you want a real ocean view book ocean front or the lowest catagory room and you will do better
Being on the north end of the beach it is got a quieter and more peaceful vibe than some of the flashier resorts further down the boardwalk
